casebody.data:
STATE ex SCHROER v SCHIRMER et Decided July 9, 1934 *538Prank K. Bowman, Cincinnati, for relator. Louis J. Schneider, Cincinnati, Prosecuting Attorney, and Walter H. Bachrach, Cincinnati, for respondents.

Ohio Appeals, 1st Dist, Hamilton Co

For full opinion see 2 OO 246; 49 Oh Ap 103.
